popt4jlib.LocalSearch

Class IntSetN21AllMovesMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • popt4jlib.LocalSearch.IntSetN21AllMovesMaker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AllChromosomeMakerIntf
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntSetN21GraphAllMovesMaker

    public class IntSetN21AllMovesMaker
extends java.lang.Object
implements AllChromosomeMakerIntf
    the class implements the notion of the N_{2+1} neighborhood of a set of integers. In particular, it is the same as the IntSetN2AllMovesMaker plus it adds to each one of the previously created sets one or more integers (the selection is only from the set of filter results).

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

        public java.util.Vector createAllChromosomes(java.lang.Object chromosome,

        implements the N_2+1 neighborhood for sets of integers.
        Specified by:
        createAllChromosomes in interface AllChromosomeMakerIntf
        Parameters:
        chromosome - Object // Set<Integer>
        params - Hashtable must contain a key-value pair <"dls.intsetneighborhoodfilter", IntSetNeighborhoodFilterIntf filter> The filter specifies the ints to be tried for addition to the set given an int to be removed from the set.
        Returns:
        Vector // Vector<IntSet>
        Throws:
        OptimizerException
